changeSet.author: MineStar
changeSet.comment: MO-9326: Remove orphaned plan lane points
changeSet.sql: DELETE FROM PLAN_LANE_POINTS_LEFT WHERE PLAN_LANE_POINTS_OID NOT IN (SELECT PLAN_LANE_POINTS_OID FROM SPOT_POINT_ENTRY_POINTS) AND PLAN_LANE_POINTS_OID NOT IN (SELECT PLAN_LANE_POINTS_OID FROM SPOT_POINT_EXIT_POINTS)

DELETE FROM PLAN_LANE_POINTS_PATH WHERE PLAN_LANE_POINTS_OID NOT IN (SELECT PLAN_LANE_POINTS_OID FROM SPOT_POINT_ENTRY_POINTS) AND PLAN_LANE_POINTS_OID NOT IN (SELECT PLAN_LANE_POINTS_OID FROM SPOT_POINT_EXIT_POINTS)

DELETE FROM PLAN_LANE_POINTS_RIGHT WHERE PLAN_LANE_POINTS_OID NOT IN (SELECT PLAN_LANE_POINTS_OID FROM SPOT_POINT_ENTRY_POINTS) AND PLAN_LANE_POINTS_OID NOT IN (SELECT PLAN_LANE_POINTS_OID FROM SPOT_POINT_EXIT_POINTS)

DELETE FROM PLAN_LANE_POINTS WHERE PLAN_LANE_POINTS_OID NOT IN (SELECT PLAN_LANE_POINTS_OID FROM SPOT_POINT_ENTRY_POINTS) AND PLAN_LANE_POINTS_OID NOT IN (SELECT PLAN_LANE_POINTS_OID FROM SPOT_POINT_EXIT_POINTS)
